group_1.narration: The final moments of these Magical Girls,@and the hope they entrusted to me.
The memories of those involved are inscribed here,@along with their thoughts and emotions.
That's why I think this inherited hope deserves@more than what someone like me can provide.
I'll entrust this to Promised Blood.@Please put her ship on course to the future.

group_1.textCenter: Sorry, Sis…@I can't go to Valhalla.
Before I realized it, I was having so much fun…
I'm an immortal pretending to serve your dream.@There's simply no way I would've been chosen…
Yet even so, I still wanted to board your ship@with you.
The least I can do, then, is entrust my feelings@for you to the future.
As the legend goes, doing so will save Magical@Girls.
All I want is for you to safely sail around@the world.
So if by some miracle we meet again in Valhalla,@tell me…
Tell me about the different lands you see.@Of the winds and waves your ship receives.
Tell me all about the world those merchants@saw.
